Dániel Garamvölgyi
  • Publications

Selected talks

  • Stress-linked pairs of vertices (slides)
    NII Shonan Meeting on Theory and Algorithms in Graph Rigidity and Algebraic Statistics
    Shonan Village Center, Japan. September 2–6, 2024.
  • Rigidity and reconstruction in matroids of highly connected graphs (slides)
    2024 Workshop on (Mostly) Matroids
    IBS, Daejeon. August 19–23, 2024.
  • Partial reflections and globally linked pairs in rigid graphs (slides, video recording)
    Workshop on Constraint Systems: Distance Geometry, Structured Polynomials, Matrix Completion and Kinematics
    Fields Institute, Toronto. August 8–11, 2023.
  • Minimally globally rigid graphs (slides, video recording)
    Workshop on Geometric Constraints: Materials, Graphs and Matroids, Rigidity and Packings
    Fields Institute, Toronto. July 10–14, 2023.
  • Algebraic realizations of pairs of closure operators (slides)
    12th Japanese-Hungarian Symposium on Discrete Mathematics and Its Applications
    ELTE, Budapest. March 21–24, 2023.
  • Globally rigid graphs are fully reconstructible (slides)
    Research Seminar of the Thematic Program on Geometric Constraint Systems, Framework Rigidity, and Distance Geometry
    Fields Institute, Toronto. June 30, 2021. (online)
  • Global rigidity of unit ball graphs (slides)
    Geometric constraint systems: rigidity, flexibility and applications
    Lancaster University, Lancaster. June 11–14, 2019.

Events

  • 2025
    • (planned) May 26–29: invited speaker at the 13th Hungarian-Japanese Symposium on Discrete Mathematics and Its Applications in Tokyo.
    • (planned) January 29 – May 2: semester postdoc at the Geometry of Materials, Packings and Rigid Frameworks program at ICERM, Providence.
      • (planned) March 17–25: invited speaker at the Matroids, rigidity, and algebraic statistics workshop at ICERM, Providence.
  • 2024
    • September 2–6: speaker at the NII Shonan Meeting on Theory and Algorithms in Graph Rigidity and Algebraic Statistics meeting at Shonan Village Center, Japan.
    • August 19–23: speaker at the 2024 Workshop on (Mostly) Matroids at IBS, Daejeon.
    • July 22–26: participant at a Research-in-Groups focused research program at ICMS, Edinburgh.
    • July 14–18: participant at the 16th Emléktábla Workshop in Vác, Hungary.
    • April 8–12: participant at the Rigidity in Action workshop at RICAM, Linz.
    • March 4–13: participant at the Landscapes of rigidity and the Code of rigidity workshops at RICAM, Linz.
  • 2023
    • July 10 – August 12: long-term participant at the Focus Program on Geometric Constraint Systems at the Fields Institute, Toronto.
      • August 8–11: speaker at the Workshop on Constraint Systems: Distance Geometry, Structured Polynomials, Matrix Completion and Kinematics at the Fields Institute, Toronto.
      • July 10–14: speaker at the Workshop on Geometric Constraints: Materials, Graphs and Matroids, Rigidity and Packings at the Fields Institute, Toronto.
    • March 21–24: speaker at the 12th Japanese-Hungarian Symposium on Discrete Mathematics and Its Applications, Budapest.
  • 2022
    • July 4–8: participant at the 12th Emléktábla Workshop in Gárdony, Hungary.
  • 2020
    • January 13–17: participant at the Discrete structures 2020 workshop at Lancaster University, Lancaster.
  • 2019
    • June 11–14: speaker at the Geometric constraint systems: rigidity, flexibility and applications conference at Lancaster University, Lancaster.
